It's all about happiness...

"People and Organisations out-perform when all involved are happier." - Cambridge Business School and MIT, 2019.

When one is quiet and really listens, one knows happiness for what it is - for ourselves. For one it is fun, another love, another health, another wealth, another freedom - an almost endless list, perhaps a mix, perhaps a progression, perhaps a circle. Organisations benefit so the world benefits.
